data.actual_result: it shows both edits as edit for the role
data.expected_result: role edit is shown as role edit in audit log and user edit is shown as user edit
data.short_description: [Audit Log] editing user perms after editing role perms in the same channel shows both actions in aufit log as role edit
data.steps_to_repro: - add a role to channel perms and give it a perm - add a user to the same channel perms and give him a different permission
